front.title: RSVP Over ATM: Framework and UNI 3.0/3.1 Method

abstract.t: This note presents a method for running RSVP over ATM switched virtual circuits (SVCs). It presents an overall approach to the problem, as well as a specific method for running over today's ATM networks. The note includes a review of major related issues, an overview of the proposed approach, and a specific method usable with UNI 3.0 and 3.1. This note is intended to be used as a basis for discussion in the IETF ISSLL working group.
